pizzerias.name: Pizza Cosy
pizzerias.specialty: Pizza Hawaï (sauce tomate, mozzarella, jambon, ananas frais)
pizzerias.description: Local chain emphasizing organic and locally-sourced ingredients. Their Hawaiian pizza uses fresh, not canned, pineapple and high-quality ham from local producers.

pizzerias.name: Mamamia
pizzerias.specialty: Hawaïenne (sauce tomate, mozzarella fior di latte, jambon supérieur, ananas)
pizzerias.description: Authentic Italian pizzeria in the heart of Lyon, using a wood-fired oven. Their Hawaiian pizza combines traditional Italian technique with the popular pineapple-ham combination.

pizzerias.name: Da Luigi
pizzerias.specialty: Pizza Tropicale (sauce tomate, mozzarella, jambon blanc, ananas, olives)
pizzerias.description: Family-run Italian restaurant serving traditional thin-crust pizzas since 1992. Their tropical pizza adds olives to the classic Hawaiian combination for an extra Mediterranean touch.
